div.bibl: Dansk Tidende (Danish Times), Dec. 4, 1925. DR. TAGE ELLINGER

body.p: President Coolidge visited the International Live Stock Exposition this week and delivered a speech on the subject "Economy and Facts of Business." The president addressed himself to the American farmer especially.

As a consequence of the president's speech and appeal a "Department of Live Stock Economics" has been established, and Dr. Tage Ellinger has been appointed head of the department which is purely philanthropic, but is expected to be of great significance to American farmers.
